channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nancy Mace berated airport police and TSA agents, incident report says
item.description: The report claims Mace called officers “incompetent” and accused them of mistreating her.

item.title: White House restricts media access in key area of the West Wing
item.description: The move limiting free press access to Room 140, which houses the offices of the press secretary and other staff, was said to be based on national sec...

item.title: Trump touts Lincoln Bathroom overhaul featuring marble, gold fixtures
item.description: The president unveiled the renovation project on his way to spend the weekend at his club in Mar-a-Lago as pressure mounts to reopen the government.

item.title: Trump wants to shatter the filibuster, another Senate norm. Republicans are pushing back.
item.description: Trump's second term has broken presidential norms at a breakneck pace, but his demand that Republicans initiate the "nuclear option" of ending of the ...

item.title: November SNAP benefits are on hold but grocers, apps are filling food gap
item.description: Millions of families are bracing for empty EBT cards this weekend as SNAP benefits pause — spurring grocers, delivery apps and nonprofits to move fast...

item.title: Trump asking court how to "legally fund SNAP" after judge's order
item.description: The Trump administration must continue funding the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) during the government shutdown, a federal judge in...

item.title: The rate cut skeptics' case
item.description: The hawks on the Federal Open Market Committee see resilient growth, booming financial markets, too-high inflation, and a labor market that is more or...

item.title: Which states are declaring emergencies over SNAP funding
item.description: As of Thursday, 14 states have announced funding for food banks, two have announced direct financial aid and six have announced a combination of both....

item.title: Tucker Carlson’s interview with white nationalist triggers GOP backlash
item.description: The appearance of far-right activist Nick Fuentes reopened a debate in the Republican Party over how forcefully to condemn antisemitism.

item.title: Trump administration must release billions in SNAP funds, judge says
item.description: Officials must act “as soon as possible,” a federal judge in Rhode Island said. A Massachusetts judge also told the administration to consider conting...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
